wishlistDescription: With this app, you will be able to save all your wishes from almost all stores in the world in one place. Share your wish list with friends and family, and some of your wishes may come true!
wishlistLinkCopied: The wish list link has been copied.
userHasNoWishes: The user currently has no wishes
noWishes: You currently have no wishes. Create your first wish by entering a product link in the field above.
